Create a new user under the organization unit specified by the handle path

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple","explode":false,"description":"Hierarchical path of organization unit handles separated by forward slashes.\nThe new user will be created under the organization unit specified by this path.\nExamples:\n- `engineering` - Creates a new user under the \"engineering\" OU\n- `engineering/frontend` - Creates a new user under \"engineering/frontend\"\n","example":"engineering/frontend"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","description":"The type of user","example":"employee"},"groups":{"type":"array","description":"List of groups that the user should belong to","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Group ID"}},"attributes":{"type":"object","description":"User attributes","additionalProperties":true,"example":{"username":"john.doe","firstname":"John","lastname":"Doe","email":"john.doe@company.com","department":"Engineering"}}},"title":"CreateUserByPathRequest"},"example":{"organizationUnit":"a839f4bd-39dc-4eaa-b5cc-210d8ecaee87","type":"employee","groups":["880e8400-e29b-41d4-a716-446655440003","990e8400-e29b-41d4-a716-446655440004"],"attributes":{"username":"john.doe","firstname":"John","lastname":"Doe","email":"john.doe@company.com","department":"Engineering"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
